featured.text: Divorced black women in American society.
In 1964, Morrison got divorced and devoted herself to writing.

definition.zh_def: 離婚，指夫妻之間法律上解除婚姻關係的過程。
definition.en_def: The legal dissolution of a marriage by a court or other competent body.
definition.example: After years of conflict, they decided to file for divorce.
